scripts.release:auto-rev: npm run release:prepare-rev; npm run release:finish
scripts.release:auto-min: npm run release:prepare-min; npm run release:finish
scripts.release:auto-maj: npm run release:prepare-maj; npm run release:finish
scripts.release:finish: git flow release finish; git push --tags
scripts.release:prepare-rev: git flow release start `npm run version:next-rev | tail -n1`; npm run version:increment-rev
scripts.release:prepare-min: git flow release start `npm run version:next-min | tail -n1`; npm run version:increment-min
scripts.release:prepare-maj: git flow release start `npm run version:next-maj | tail -n1`; npm run version:increment-maj
scripts.version:increment-rev: npm run version:next-rev | tail -n1  > version.bak; rm version; mv version.bak version; git add version; git commit -m "RELEASE(rev)"
scripts.version:increment-min: awk -F'.' '{printf("%d.%d.0\n",$1,$2+1)}'     version > version.bak; rm version; mv version.bak version; git add version; git commit -m "RELEASE(min)"
scripts.version:increment-maj: awk -F'.' '{printf("%d.0.0\n",$1+1)}'         version > version.bak; rm version; mv version.bak version; git add version; git commit -m "RELEASE(maj)"
scripts.git:ignore-secret: npm run git:ignore-secret:add; npm run git:ignore-secret:checkout
